subject: Create TDD execution and verification references for sdd-tools
description:
Create two reference files for the execute-tdd-tasks skill in sdd-tools.

**File 1: `claude/sdd-tools/skills/execute-tdd-tasks/references/tdd-execution-workflow.md`**

Document the TDD-aware execution workflow:
- Wave-based execution adapted for TDD task pairs
- Strategic parallelism rules:
  - PARALLEL: Multiple test-writer agents can generate tests simultaneously across different features
  - SEQUENTIAL: RED-GREEN-REFACTOR phases are sequential within a single task pair
  - Wave grouping: test tasks in Wave N, their paired implementation tasks in Wave N+1
- Session management: reuse execution context from execute-tasks (session ID, execution context sharing)
- Agent spawning: tdd-executor agents (from tdd-tools) for TDD tasks, standard task-executor for non-TDD tasks
- Context sharing between test and implementation phases (test task output informs implementation task)
- Max parallel configuration from settings (default: 5, from agent-alchemy.local.md)

**File 2: `claude/sdd-tools/skills/execute-tdd-tasks/references/tdd-verification-patterns.md`**

Document TDD-specific verification rules (extending existing verification-patterns.md):
- RED Phase Verification:
  - PASS: All new tests fail as expected
  - WARN: Some tests pass unexpectedly (possible pre-existing implementation)
  - FAIL: Tests cannot be run (syntax errors, missing dependencies)
- GREEN Phase Verification:
  - PASS: All tests pass (new + existing), zero regressions
  - PARTIAL: New tests pass but existing tests regressed
  - FAIL: New tests still failing after implementation
- REFACTOR Verification:
  - PASS: All tests still green after cleanup
  - PARTIAL: Tests broke during refactor, reverted to pre-refactor state
  - FAIL: Tests broke and cannot be recovered
- Per-task TDD compliance reporting:
  - RED verified: boolean (tests failed before implementation)
  - GREEN verified: boolean (tests pass after implementation)
  - Refactored: boolean (cleanup performed while maintaining green)
  - Coverage delta: percentage change from pre to post

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] Execution workflow documents wave-based TDD execution with strategic parallelism
- [ ] Verification patterns cover RED, GREEN, and REFACTOR phases with PASS/PARTIAL/FAIL states
- [ ] Session management reuse from execute-tasks documented
- [ ] Per-task TDD compliance reporting format defined

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Mixed TDD and non-TDD tasks in same group documented
- [ ] Test-writer agent failure: retry with fallback strategy documented
- [ ] Pre-existing test failures handling documented

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] tdd-tools not installed scenario documented
- [ ] Agent spawn failures documented

**Testing Requirements:**
• Manual: Verify execution workflow is clear and complete
• Manual: Validate verification patterns align with tdd-workflow.md definitions

Source: specs/tdd-features-SPEC.md Section 5.5, 9.2
